Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons

Class WeaponFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons.WeaponFactory
  • public class WeaponFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the interactive parts of the weapons (the attacks)

      Enum representing the property values encountered in the json

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> activePlayerStartingPoint()
      This method returns a Function that sets the starting point as the Block of the active player
      private static Range computeRange​(com.google.gson.JsonObject distance, int maxAvailable)
      This method creates a Range to store a JsonObject containing min and/or max value.
      (package private) static Weapon create​(java.lang.String name, Board board)
      This method is used to create any weapon
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Weapon> createWeaponDictionary​(Board board)
      Creates a dictionary associating a ready to use Weapon to its name
      private static TargetCalculator elaborateFindingTarget​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, Board board, TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator)
      This method returns the appropriate TargetCalculator for the occasion.
      private static TargetCalculator fixedDirectionTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, Board board, boolean goesThroughWalls)
      This method creates the FixedDirectionTargetCalculator corresponding to the value FIXED of the property targetDirection of the actionObject.
      private static TargetCalculator fixedDistanceTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, Board board)
      This method creates the FixedDistanceTargetCalculator having the distance specified in actionObject
      private static TargetCalculator fixedVisibilityTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, Board board)
      This method creates the FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator having the visibility specified in actionObject.
      private static TargetCalculator inheritedTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, Board board, TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator)
      This method inherits the last FixedDirectionTargetCalculator, whether it is alone or inside a CompoundTargetCalculator If a distance is specified as well, the calculator will be a CompoundTargetCalculator
      private static java.util.Optional<Player> inheritLastTarget​(java.util.List<Player> allTargets, Player activePlayer)
      This method scans a List<Player> looking for the last Player that can be found in it as long as it is different from the activePlayer
      private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> inheritStartingPoint()
      This method returns a Function that inherits the previous starting point, which must be present
      private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> inheritStartingPointIfPresent()
      This method returns a Function that inherits the previous starting point if it is present, otherwise it sets it to the default value (the Block of the active player)
      private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> previousTargetStartingPoint()
      This method returns a Function that sets the starting point as the Block on which the last hit target (different from the active player) can be found
      private static ActionConfig readAction​(com.google.gson.JsonElement action, TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator, Board board)
      This method reads the JsonElement representing the ActionConfig that shall be created
      private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readActionType​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, int boardSize)
      This method reads the type of the action, possible values are specified in jsonAttacks.md
      private static Attack readAttack​(com.google.gson.JsonElement jsonElement, Board board)
      This method reads the JsonElement representing the Attack that shall be created
      private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Player>> readAvailableTargets()
      This method restricts the hittable targets
      private static java.util.function.BiFunction<java.util.List<Player>,​Player,​java.util.Set<Player>> readBonusTarget​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
      This method is used to retrieve the bonus targets from the given JsonObject.
      private static java.util.function.BiFunction<java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>,​Weapon,​java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>> readCompoundTargetRequirements​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
      This method, assuming that the field andTargets exists, reads its value and updates the targets accordingly.
      private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readDamageExecutor​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
      This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type damage
      private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readFixedTargetMoveExecutor​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, Range range, int boardSize)
      This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type move with a targetFinalPosition having FIXED as value
      private static void readFromFile()
      This method analyzes the json configuration file and fills the Map with the appropriate JsonObject instances
      private static java.util.function.BiFunction<java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>,​Weapon,​java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>> readMandatoryExtras​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
      This method reads the property andTargets, if it is present, and adds those targets to each set.
      private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readMarkExecutor​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
      This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type mark
      private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readMoveExecutor​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, int boardSize)
      This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type move
      private static java.util.function.Function<java.util.Set<Player>,​java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>> readScope​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
      This method reads the scope of the action, represented by the property targetAmount in actionObject.
      private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readStandardMoveExecutor​(Range range)
      This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type move without a targetFinalPosition
      private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> readStartingPoint​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
      This method reads the startingPoint property of actionObject.
      private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readStraightTargetMoveExecutor​(Range range)
      This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type move with a targetFinalPosition having STRAIGHT as value
      private static TargetCalculator readTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator, Board board)
      This method reads the JsonObject and looks for the property targets: if it is set to FIND, it calls elaborateFindingTarget, in all other cases it returns null.
      private static java.util.function.BiFunction<java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>,​Weapon,​java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>> readVeto​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
      This method creates a BiFunction that will remove some targets from the pre-computed Set of potential targets See jsonAttacks.md to view the supported values for the veto property
      private static Weapon readWeapon​(com.google.gson.JsonObject weaponObject, Board board)
      This method reads the properties of the given JsonObject that represents the weapon, in order to find the right type and attacks
      private static <T> java.util.Set<java.util.Set<T>> removeFromSet​(java.util.Set<java.util.Set<T>> original, java.util.List<T> toRemove)
      This method removes all the T elements contained in toRemove from the sets contained in original
      private static TargetCalculator straightTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject, Board board, TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator)
      This method creates the FixedDirectionTargetCalculator, either inheriting it or instancing a new one.
      private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> visibleStartingPoint​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
      This method returns a Function that returns the potential starting points, which must be visible by the active player.

      • create

        static Weapon create​(java.lang.String name,
                     Board board)
        This method is used to create any weapon
        Parameters:
        name - the enum corresponding to the desired weapon
        board - the Board on which the weapons will be used
        Returns:
        the weapon, ready to be bought

        Creates a dictionary associating a ready to use Weapon to its name
        Parameters:
        board - the Board on which the weapons will be used
        Returns:
        a Map<String, Weapon> that associates the name to the relative Weapon

      • readFromFile

        private static void readFromFile()
        This method analyzes the json configuration file and fills the Map with the appropriate JsonObject instances

      • readWeapon

        private static Weapon readWeapon​(com.google.gson.JsonObject weaponObject,
                                 Board board)
        This method reads the properties of the given JsonObject that represents the weapon, in order to find the right type and attacks
        Parameters:
        weaponObject - the JsonObject representing the weapon
        board - the Board that is being used
        Returns:
        the corresponding Weapon

      • readAttack

        private static Attack readAttack​(com.google.gson.JsonElement jsonElement,
                                 Board board)
        This method reads the JsonElement representing the Attack that shall be created
        Parameters:
        jsonElement - the JsonElement to analyze
        board - the Board that is being used
        Returns:
        the corresponding Attack

      • readAction

        private static ActionConfig readAction​(com.google.gson.JsonElement action,
                                       @Nullable
                                       TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator,
                                       Board board)
        This method reads the JsonElement representing the ActionConfig that shall be created
        Parameters:
        action - the JsonElement to analyze
        lastTargetCalculator - the last TargetCalculator created for the Attack (it may be null)
        board - the Board that is being used
        Returns:
        the corresponding ActionConfig

      • readTargetCalculator

        @Nullable
private static TargetCalculator readTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                     @Nullable
                                                     TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator,
                                                     Board board)
        This method reads the JsonObject and looks for the property targets: if it is set to FIND, it calls elaborateFindingTarget, in all other cases it returns null. It is required for the JsonObject to have a property named targets, see jsonAttacks.md for further info
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject corresponding to the analyzed action
        lastTargetCalculator - the last TargetCalculator computed while scanning the current attack, or null if none has yet been computed
        board - the Board on which the target analyses will be made
        Returns:
        the computed TargetCalculator, or null if none was appliable to the action

      • readBonusTarget

        private static java.util.function.BiFunction<java.util.List<Player>,​Player,​java.util.Set<Player>> readBonusTarget​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
        This method is used to retrieve the bonus targets from the given JsonObject. The bonus targets are those players that are going to be targeted by the attack independently from their position on the board (for those, see readTargetCalculator). It is required for the JsonObject to have a property named targets, see jsonAttacks.md for further info
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        Returns:
        a BiFunction that takes List<Player>, the players that were previously hit by the weapon, and a Player, the active player, as arguments and returns the Set<Player> representing the bonus targets, which will be empty if none are present

      • readAvailableTargets

        private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Player>> readAvailableTargets()
        This method restricts the hittable targets
        Returns:
        a Function that takes Weapon, the weapon that is being used, and returns a Set<Player>, the available targets

      • elaborateFindingTarget

        private static TargetCalculator elaborateFindingTarget​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                       Board board,
                                                       @Nullable
                                                       TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator)
        This method returns the appropriate TargetCalculator for the occasion. It is required that actionObject has the property targetPosition, see jsonAttacks.md for further info
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        board - the Board on which the targets will be found
        lastTargetCalculator - the previous TargetCalculator for this attack, which can be null
        Returns:
        the new TargetCalculator, which might be null if lastTargetCalculator was null
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if the value of targetPosition is not supported

      • fixedDistanceTargetCalculator

        private static TargetCalculator fixedDistanceTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                              Board board)
        This method creates the FixedDistanceTargetCalculator having the distance specified in actionObject
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        board - the Board on which the targets will be found
        Returns:
        the new TargetCalculator

      • fixedVisibilityTargetCalculator

        private static TargetCalculator fixedVisibilityTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                                Board board)
        This method creates the FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator having the visibility specified in actionObject. If there is also a constraint for the distance, it will create a CompoundTargetCalculator containing both requested calculators
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        board - the Board on which the targets will be found
        Returns:
        the new TargetCalculator

      • straightTargetCalculator

        private static TargetCalculator straightTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                         Board board,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator)
        This method creates the FixedDirectionTargetCalculator, either inheriting it or instancing a new one. If a distance is specified as well, the calculator will be a CompoundTargetCalculator. The property targetDirection must be present in actionObject and it must be one of the supported values, see jsonAttacks.md for further info
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        board - the Board on which the targets will be found
        lastTargetCalculator - the previous TargetCalculator for this attack, which can be null
        Returns:
        the new TargetCalculator
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if the value of targetDirection is not supported

      • fixedDirectionTargetCalculator

        private static TargetCalculator fixedDirectionTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                               Board board,
                                                               boolean goesThroughWalls)
        This method creates the FixedDirectionTargetCalculator corresponding to the value FIXED of the property targetDirection of the actionObject. If a distance is specified as well, the calculator will be a CompoundTargetCalculator
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        board - the Board on which the targets will be found
        goesThroughWalls - true if the weapon can hit targets that are behind a wall, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the new TargetCalculator

      • inheritedTargetCalculator

        private static TargetCalculator inheritedTargetCalculator​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                          Board board,
                                                          @Nullable
                                                          TargetCalculator lastTargetCalculator)
        This method inherits the last FixedDirectionTargetCalculator, whether it is alone or inside a CompoundTargetCalculator If a distance is specified as well, the calculator will be a CompoundTargetCalculator
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        board - the Board on which the targets will be found
        lastTargetCalculator - the previous TargetCalculator for this attack, which might, but should not, be null
        Returns:
        the new (or inherited) TargetCalculator
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if the TargetCalculator that should be inherited is null or is not a FixedDistanceTargetCalculator

      • computeRange

        private static Range computeRange​(com.google.gson.JsonObject distance,
                                  int maxAvailable)
        This method creates a Range to store a JsonObject containing min and/or max value. Default value for min is 0, default value for max is maxAvailable
        Parameters:
        distance - the JsonObject containing a Range
        maxAvailable - the default max value to use if max property does not exist
        Returns:
        a Range with the given values

      • readScope

        private static java.util.function.Function<java.util.Set<Player>,​java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>> readScope​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
        This method reads the scope of the action, represented by the property targetAmount in actionObject. This property must exist, see jsonAttacks.md for further info about the supported values
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        Returns:
        a Function taking a Set<Player>, the targets computed so far, as input and returning a Set<Set<Player>> containing the grouped targets and eventual extras due to the grouping method
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if the value of targetAmount is not supported

      • readMandatoryExtras

        private static java.util.function.BiFunction<java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>,​Weapon,​java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>> readMandatoryExtras​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
        This method reads the property andTargets, if it is present, and adds those targets to each set. See jsonAttacks.md for further info about this property
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        Returns:
        a BiFunction taking a Set<Set<Player>>, the pre-computed targets, and a Weapon, the weapon this attacks belongs to, and returns the updated Set<Set<Player>>

      • readCompoundTargetRequirements

        private static java.util.function.BiFunction<java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>,​Weapon,​java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>> readCompoundTargetRequirements​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
        This method, assuming that the field andTargets exists, reads its value and updates the targets accordingly. See jsonAttacks.md for the supported values
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        Returns:
        a BiFunction taking a Set<Set<Player>>, the pre-computed targets, and a Weapon, the weapon this attacks belongs to, and returns the updated Set<Set<Player>>
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if the value of andTargets is not supported

      • inheritLastTarget

        private static java.util.Optional<Player> inheritLastTarget​(java.util.List<Player> allTargets,
                                                            Player activePlayer)
        This method scans a List<Player> looking for the last Player that can be found in it as long as it is different from the activePlayer
        Parameters:
        allTargets - the List<Player> to analyze
        activePlayer - the Player that should be excluded
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the desired Player, if present

      • readVeto

        private static java.util.function.BiFunction<java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>,​Weapon,​java.util.Set<java.util.Set<Player>>> readVeto​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
        This method creates a BiFunction that will remove some targets from the pre-computed Set of potential targets See jsonAttacks.md to view the supported values for the veto property
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        Returns:
        a BiFunction that takes a Set<Set<Player>>, the pre-computed targets, and a Weapon and returns the updated Set<Set<Player>>
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if the value of veto is not supported

      • removeFromSet

        private static <T> java.util.Set<java.util.Set<T>> removeFromSet​(java.util.Set<java.util.Set<T>> original,
                                                                 java.util.List<T> toRemove)
        This method removes all the T elements contained in toRemove from the sets contained in original
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the elements
        Parameters:
        original - the Set<Set<T>> from which the elements will be removed
        toRemove - the List<T> of elements to remove
        Returns:
        the updated Set<Set<T>>

      • readStartingPoint

        private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> readStartingPoint​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
        This method reads the startingPoint property of actionObject. See jsonAttacks.md for info about the supported values
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        Returns:
        a Function that appropriately computes a Set<Block> representing the possible starting points, taking a Weapon, the current weapon, as a parameter
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if the value of startingPoint is not supported

      • inheritStartingPoint

        private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> inheritStartingPoint()
        This method returns a Function that inherits the previous starting point, which must be present
        Returns:
        a Function that appropriately computes a Set<Block> representing the possible starting points, taking a Weapon, the current weapon, as a parameter
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if there was no previous starting point

      • inheritStartingPointIfPresent

        private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> inheritStartingPointIfPresent()
        This method returns a Function that inherits the previous starting point if it is present, otherwise it sets it to the default value (the Block of the active player)
        Returns:
        a Function that appropriately computes a Set<Block> representing the possible starting points, taking a Weapon, the current weapon, as a parameter

      • activePlayerStartingPoint

        private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> activePlayerStartingPoint()
        This method returns a Function that sets the starting point as the Block of the active player
        Returns:
        a Function that appropriately computes a Set<Block> representing the possible starting points, taking a Weapon, the current weapon, as a parameter

      • visibleStartingPoint

        private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> visibleStartingPoint​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
        This method returns a Function that returns the potential starting points, which must be visible by the active player. It also checks for the presence of andNotStartingPoint, which may add a further restriction
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        Returns:
        a Function that appropriately computes a Set<Block> representing the possible starting points, taking a Weapon, the current weapon, as a parameter

      • previousTargetStartingPoint

        private static java.util.function.Function<Weapon,​java.util.Set<Block>> previousTargetStartingPoint()
        This method returns a Function that sets the starting point as the Block on which the last hit target (different from the active player) can be found
        Returns:
        a Function that appropriately computes a Set<Block> representing the possible starting points, taking a Weapon, the current weapon, as a parameter
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if no previous target could be found

      • readActionType

        private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readActionType​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                                                                int boardSize)
        This method reads the type of the action, possible values are specified in jsonAttacks.md
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        boardSize - the dimension of the Board
        Returns:
        a TriConsumer that handles the execution of the given action, given the targets (a Set<Player), an Interviewer used to ask for eventual feedback and the Weapon
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if none of the supported actions was found

      • readDamageExecutor

        private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readDamageExecutor​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
        This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type damage
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        Returns:
        a TriConsumer that handles the execution of a damage action, given the targets (a Set<Player), an Interviewer used to ask for eventual feedback and the Weapon

      • readMarkExecutor

        private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readMarkExecutor​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject)
        This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type mark
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        Returns:
        a TriConsumer that handles the execution of a mark action, given the targets (a Set<Player), an Interviewer used to ask for eventual feedback and the Weapon

      • readMoveExecutor

        private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readMoveExecutor​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                                                                  int boardSize)
        This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type move
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        boardSize - the size of the Board
        Returns:
        a TriConsumer that handles the execution of a move action, given the targets (a Set<Player), an Interviewer used to ask for eventual feedback and the Weapon
        Throws:
        IncoherentConfigurationException - if a targetFinalPosition is specified with a non-valid value (see jsonAttacks.md for info)

      • readFixedTargetMoveExecutor

        private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readFixedTargetMoveExecutor​(com.google.gson.JsonObject actionObject,
                                                                                                             Range range,
                                                                                                             int boardSize)
        This method returns a TriConsumer that will handle an action of type move with a targetFinalPosition having FIXED as value
        Parameters:
        actionObject - the JsonObject to analyze
        boardSize - the size of the Board
        range - the Range of possible moves
        Returns:
        a TriConsumer that handles the execution of a move action, given the targets (a Set<Player), an Interviewer used to ask for eventual feedback and the Weapon

        private static TriConsumer<java.util.Set<Player>,​Interviewer,​Weapon> readStraightTargetMoveExecutor​(Range range)

        Parameters:
        range - the Range of possible moves
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
